title: IFlatPatternFeatureData.SimplifyBends
description: Gets or sets whether to simplify bends in this Flat-Pattern feature.
returns: True to simplify edges to lines, false to leave edges complex
remarks:
This property corresponds to the
Simplify bends
check box on the
Parameters
group box on the
Flat Pattern
PropertyManager, which is displayed when you edit the definition of a flat-pattern feature with complex bends in SOLIDWORKS.
